attributes.action: A complete and thorough independent review of HMRC and their processes
attributes.additional_details: People paying tax and considerably too much should be able to communicate with a organisation that is taking money from earnings. Currently a complaint takes in excess of 6 months and when someone has no money because you are been taxed more than 50% of your earnings this timeframe is unacceptable. A complete review of HMRC is needed and being demanded by the working people of this country
attributes.background: An independent review of HMRC is needed for a complete reform.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709630
